scripts.copy:libs: cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js dist/js/alpine.min.js && cp node_modules/@fancyapps/ui/dist/fancybox/fancybox.umd.js dist/js/fancybox.umd.js && cp node_modules/@fancyapps/ui/dist/fancybox/fancybox.css dist/css/fancybox.css && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/js/jquery.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run copy:libs
